pr_title: [BEAM-9769] Ensuring JSON is the default export format for BQ sink

timeline.message:
[BEAM-9769] Ensuring JSON is the default export format for BQ sink

fixup

Adding documentation to CHANGES.md

[BEAM-9769] Ensuring JSON is the default export format for BQ sink

fixup

Adding documentation to CHANGES.md

timeline.bodyText: Why change these? (Not opposed just curious for the record)
timeline.author: ibzib
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -176,7 +176,7 @@ def test_many_files(self):
     file length is very small, so only a couple records fit in each file.
     """
 
-    fn = bqfl.WriteRecordsToFile(schema=_ELEMENTS_SCHEMA, max_file_size=300)
+    fn = bqfl.WriteRecordsToFile(schema=_ELEMENTS_SCHEMA, max_file_size=50)

replies.bodyText: 50 and 300 are the file sizes that force the transform to spill out after a couple elements in JSON and AVRO respectively.
replies.author: pabloem
